job_text: ['', 'DataPoint Armenia', 'The Health Data Classification Project will work on sample medical datasets from multiple sources including whole image slides, EHR data, and a combination of both. We will work to establish EDA, classification models, and other relevant conclusions related to this data in order to expose more data-driven members to the realm of health data, as well as create a beneficial tool for use within the Armenian health industry. The project applies novel Machine Learning models on medical datasets, whether it be electronic health records (things like blood pressure, heart rate, etc), or whole image slides (e.g. scans of lungs, CT scans, X-ray scans, etc). The ultimate goal is to produce high-performing classification models or predictors (logistic regression, neural networks, etc.) that can extract relevant and useful information from the datasets. This will be a ~8 week process during which we will produce these algorithms on the relevant data, and eventually try to apply them within a medical setting, namely Armenian hospitals, with Armenian patients’ data, thus bringing data analysis in the realm of healthcare to Armenia.', 'We will have meetings once a week at a time convenient for the whole team, during which we will dedicate the first half to updates within the team members, and the second half to discussion and assignment of tasks.', 'Opportunity to work on an impactful data science project related to Armenia\xa0', 'Hone your data science skill set with hands on data projects utilizing real world data', 'Experience with predictive modelling, experience working with ML libraries (i.e. sci-kit learn)', 'Access DataPoint Armenia’s educational workshops', 'Become part of dynamic and growing data science network', 'What You Get', 'Data analysts/ML engineer will conduct data analysis and create prediction algorithms on the relevant chosen data', 'Project Description', 'Work in small teams and get mentorship and training by project leads', 'Strong data science background: data cleaning, data analysis, data visualization, statistics and modellingComfortable with coding in Python or R2-4 years experience in programming\xa0Experience with predictive modelling, experience working with ML libraries (i.e. sci-kit learn)Experience with CNNs/Neural Networks (Preferred)', 'DataPoint Armenia\xa0is a non-profit organization created by a group of students and professionals passionate about data science. We have identified an existing need for data science literacy and utilization in Armenia, and our aim is to expand awareness, collaboration, and competency in the field to instill a culture of evidence-based decision-making.', 'Note: This is an *unpaid* volunteer position, following DataPoint Armenia’s mission to utilize data for social good and Armenia’s data development.', 'Skills and Qualifications', 'Comfortable with coding in Python or R', 'Weekly and Monthly Responsibilities', 'Our network consists of driven individuals and eclectic resources that aim to engage and support professionals and enthusiasts in the field of data science.
